about_the_game:
About the Game

Welcome to Cactus, an exciting clicker game where each click on the cactus icon can bring you random items of various kinds for your collection! Discover a world full of amazing items!

Features:

Thrilling gameplay: click on the cactus and get unique items, but be careful not to get pricked!
Collecting: expand your collection with rare and amazing items.
Achievements: unlock achievements and become the best collector.
Marketplace: create your own economic strategy.
Community-driven design: contribute your ideas and participate in the creation of new items through our Discord. All items are created with the suggestions and inspiration from our community.
Join us and become part of the fascinating world of Cactus, where every click can bring you a treasure!

name: Cactus

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: 1.0 GHz
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: 1.0 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

short_description: Welcome to Cactus, an addictive clicker game where every click on a cactus icon can bring random items for your collection! Unlock achievements and contribute your ideas via our Discord. Join us and become part of the Cactus world!
